text: SQL Server is appending spaces to the end of the role names when reading reading the preparedRoles query.  This is causing SecurityTool to think that the roles described in tomcat-users.xml are not matched up to the roles defined in the database, i.e ("users" != "users     ").
creator: dev@tomcat.apache.org

text: *** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 307 ***
creator: craig.mcclanahan@sun.com
